name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.8-69f88ee91a82ab1a8591f2f7f0fa8e4c17fa4431 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
